short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes the splash screen on BBC;continue reading with interruption. **Refresh page if splash showing**

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The BBC are now asking for registration before reading. This extension will remove the splash screen so you can continue reading without interruption.
